description.oldValue:
DocuSign users can now select sign, view and cc when creating new e-sign approval requests.  Recipients with the viewer role must view the document while the CC role allows the recipient to view it if they choose to.
GA date: May CY2022
description.newValue:
DocuSign users can now select sign, view and cc when creating new e-sign
approval requests.  Recipients with the viewer role must view the document
while the CC role allows the recipient to view it if they choose to.
